titleStmt.title: Decemb. 1. 1642. At the committee of Lords and Commons, for advance of money, and other necessaries for the army. It is this day ordered that the severall collectors of each ward, of the city of London and Liberties, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Title includes first two lines of text.
Document signed: P. Wharton, Ed. Howard. William Purefoy. Sa. Vassal. Manchester Robert Brooke. H. Vane. William Strode.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
